item.description:
Let's go to the American Independence Festival at the American Independence Museum in Exeter, NH. For over 15 years, the American Independence Festival has introduced thousands of visitors to the Seacoast region's exciting 18th century history.
The American Independence Festival has a $5.00 entrance fee, but is free for children 12 and under and museum members.

Click Here For A List of Activities:

Parking is available at the Main Street School, Lincoln Street Scool and throughout the town of Exeter. Information desk is located at Water Street entrance of Swasey Parkway. We will meet at the Information Desk.

Nashua CarPool:
Meet at the Welcome Center/Bus Station at Exit 6 off of Route 3 at 10 AM. Please go inside the building. That is where we are meeting. Look for Robert
item.name: American Independence Festival
